alert.note: Alert for Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:26PM EDT until August 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MASON AND ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairview, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mount Olivet, Sardis, US Route 62 at State Route 875, Blue Licks Battlefield, Burika, Alhambra, Mays Lick, Mitchells Mill, Peed, Helena, Piqua, US Route 62 at State Route 616, and Blue Licks Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
